questions: In summer the monkey   _   every day.
article:
The ant  works every day but the monkey plays in the tree every day in summer. One day the ant is carrying some candy to her home. Her home is next to a big tree. The monkey is playing games in the tree. He says to the ant, "Why are you working every day? It is warm today. Don't work. Come and play games with me." But the ant says, "Winter will come and it will be very cold. I want to _ lots of food. I will sleep all day in winter."
Winter will not come soon. You can work in autumn," says the monkey.
Summer and autumn are over. There is snow  everywhere. The monkey can't find any food. Do you know what will happen?
